description: This header file declares functions for parsing device descriptor lists and retrieving blacklisted UUIDs, likely for device whitelist/blacklist management in a larger system.

methods.name: parseDeviceDescriptors
methods.description: Parses device descriptor list from whitelist and optional blacklist files, returning a list of device descriptors not explicitly blacklisted.

methods.name: getBlacklistedUuids
methods.description: Parses a blacklist file to retrieve a hash map of blacklisted UUIDs for validation.
